title: The Fantasy Factory: Edgy Role-Play
description: Vicky Lane’s sex life has hit a wall. Failing to spice things up with sexy outfits and toys, the luscious housewife threatens her husband with an affair. After he carelessly dares her to go forward, Vicky calls Gavin’s bluff. Raising the stakes, she lets her dark side shine. She signs up for The Fantasy Where fantasy becomes reality. Wanting to act out her darkest taboo, she signs her freedom away, putting it in the hands of unknown men. Taken at random, an edgy adventure follows suit. Vicky hopes to teach Gavin a lesson of her value, though, by the end, the lesson will belong to them This 18,500 word story contains graphic language, erotic situations, edgy role play, medical exam, enema play, domination, submission, humiliation, (see my website for more), and is a story for adults (18+)
author: J.D. Grayson
